full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS DANG BSTOD PA RGYAL DBANG LNGA PA CHEN POS MDZAD PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B CES PA 'DI YANG DAD STOBS KYI DBANG PHYUG TSE DBANG RDO RJES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ZA HOR GYI BANDES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI 'JAM DPAL LO, ,` AOm SVA STI, ,TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG THABS MKHAS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,CHOS SDE BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING MCHOG TU, ,RGYU RKYEN SBYAR DE DPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,
